item.title: Grace add a quote by Harry Truman
item.description: "If you can't dance then you are a loser." -- Harry Truman

item.title: Grace add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Grace add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Our doubts are traitors, and make us lose the good we oft might win, by fearing to attempt." -- William Shakespeare
